user_instruction: 'Send an email to Sarah Thompson (sarah.thompson@techinnovations.com) with the additional information she requested for my job application. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Updated Application Materials

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. To complete the next step of your application for the role at Tech Innovations Inc., could you please forward the materials we discussed—namely:

• Your most recent résumé  
• Contact details for 2–3 professional references  
• Any supporting documents (certifications, portfolios, or project summaries) you’d like us to review  

If it’s helpful, feel free to pull these items from your Gmail or Notion workspace and send them as attachments or shared links.  
 
Please let me know if you have any questions or need assistance. I appreciate your prompt attention and look forward to receiving the documents.

Thank you!

Best regards,  
Sarah Thompson  
HR Representative, Tech Innovations Inc.  
sarah.thompson@techinnovations.com

final_output:
